item.title: Rjop's Power Miner V 1.5
item.dc:creator: @rjop455 rjop455
item.description:
@rjop455 wrote:

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//                   RJOP455 Power Miner.                              //
//                          V 1.5                                             //
//                     Released 9/21/06                                  //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//Credits
//Everyone that has worked on SRL and Stupid3ooo!
//V 1.0
//  -Release
//V 1.1
// -Fixed Bugs:
// -Fixed Ores Mined Counter
// -Faster Dropping.
//V 1.2
//  -Added:
//  -Forum
//  -Auto Color Picking
//V1.3
//  -Added:
//  -Better Color Picker
//V1.4
//  -Added:
//  -Advanced Dropping/Options
//  -Fixed Bugs:
//  -Changed a few things around to help the scrip
//  -Upgrade:
//  -Forums for Advanced Dropping Options.
//V1.41
//  -Fixed Bugs:
//  -Random Ore
//  -Right Xp from the ore your mining.
//V1.5
//  -Fixed Bugs:
//  -Xp from Ore now works
//  -Drop all doesn't drop your pick :)




//Note: Please have pick equiped, If you have pick in inv and have
//drops selected to drop all it will drop the pick!
//If it doesn't find rocks right please change colors on line 32-40.
//BUGS: SRL randoms sometimes don't work (Nothing I can do about it.



{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/skill/Mining.scar}
{.include SRL\SRL\misc\PlayerForm.scar}

//=============================Setup============================================

const //Don't Change unless not its not finding ores.
  Copper  = 4088198;
  Tin     = 7039862;
  Clay    = 4553880;
  Iron    = 1186614;
  Silver  = 12434885;
  Coal    = 2834753;
  Gold    = 5161431;
  Mithril = 7359564;
  Adamant = 6322272;
  MaxWait = 5;

Var
  OresMined,  DroppedOres, RockType, XP, XPRock :Integer;
  user,pass, nick: string;
  Drops :boolean;
  setupform : TForm;
  OreLabel : TLabel;
  UserLabel : TLabel;
  PassLabel : TLabel;
  NickLabel : TLabel;
  UserEdit : TEdit;
  PassEdit : TEdit;
  NickEdit : TEdit;
  StartButton : TButton;
  OreBox : TComboBox;
  CancelButton : TButton;
  YDropButton : TRadioButton;
  NDropButton : TRadioButton;

procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers:= 1;
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);
CurrentPlayer:= 0;
//////
Players[0].Name := user; //Username
Players[0].Pass := pass; //Password
Players[0].Nick := nick; //3 or 4 letters username
Players[0].Loc := ''; //Leave as blank
Players[0].Skill := 'mining'; //The skill for when you get a lamp
Players[0].Active := True; //////
end;


//=============================Forums===========================================

Procedure StartClick(sender: TObject);
begin
  setupform.Caption:= setupform.Caption + '.';
  setupform.ModalResult:= mrOk;
end;

Procedure CancelClick(sender: TObject);
begin
  Writeln('Script Canceled.');
  setupform.Caption:= setupform.Caption + '.';
  setupform.ModalResult:= mrOk;
  TerminateScript;
end;

Procedure InitSetup;
begin
setupform := CreateForm;
setupform.Left := 501;
setupform.Top := 314;
setupform.Width := 277;
setupform.Height := 275;
setupform.Caption := 'Rjop''s Miner V1.5';
setupform.Color := clBtnFace;
setupform.Font.Color := clWindowText;
setupform.Font.Height := -11;
setupform.Font.Name := 'MS Sans Serif';
setupform.Font.Style := [];
setupform.Visible := False;
setupform.PixelsPerInch := 96;

OreLabel := TLabel.Create(setupform);
OreLabel.Parent := setupform;
OreLabel.Left := 79;
OreLabel.Top := 12;
OreLabel.Width := 103;
OreLabel.Height := 13;
OreLabel.Caption := 'Ore you want to mine:';

UserLabel := TLabel.Create(setupform);
UserLabel.Parent := setupform;
UserLabel.Left := 15;
UserLabel.Top := 73;
UserLabel.Width := 217;
UserLabel.Height := 13;
UserLabel.Caption := 'Username:';

PassLabel := TLabel.Create(setupform);
PassLabel.Parent := setupform;
PassLabel.Left := 15;
PassLabel.Top := 110;
PassLabel.Width := 217;
PassLabel.Height := 13;
PassLabel.Caption := 'Password:';

NickLabel := TLabel.Create(setupform);
NickLabel.Parent := setupform;
NickLabel.Left := 15;
NickLabel.Top := 143;
NickLabel.Width := 217;
NickLabel.Height := 13;
NickLabel.Caption := 'Nick:';


StartButton := TButton.Create(setupform);
StartButton.Parent := setupform;
StartButton.OnClick := @StartClick;
StartButton.Left := 30;
StartButton.Top := 200;
StartButton.Width := 75;
StartButton.Height := 25;
StartButton.Caption := 'Mine!';
StartButton.TabOrder := 7;

OreBox := TComboBox.Create(setupform);
OreBox.Parent := setupform;
OreBox.Left := 60;
OreBox.Top := 30;
OreBox.Width := 145;
OreBox.Height := 21;
OreBox.ItemHeight := 13;
OreBox.TabOrder := 1;
OreBox.Text := 'What ore?';
OreBox.Items.Add('Copper');
OreBox.Items.Add('Tin');
OreBox.Items.Add('Clay');
OreBox.Items.Add('Iron');
OreBox.Items.Add('Silver');
OreBox.Items.Add('Coal');
OreBox.Items.Add('Gold');
OreBox.Items.Add('Mithril');
OreBox.Items.Add('Adamant');

UserEdit := TEdit.Create(setupform);
UserEdit.Parent := setupform;
UserEdit.Left := 70;
UserEdit.Top := 70;
UserEdit.Width := 121;
UserEdit.Height := 21;
UserEdit.TabOrder := 2;

NickEdit := TEdit.Create(setupform);
NickEdit.Parent := setupform;
NickEdit.Left := 70;
NickEdit.Top := 140;
NickEdit.Width := 121;
NickEdit.Height := 21;
NickEdit.TabOrder := 4;

PassEdit := TEdit.Create(setupform);
PassEdit.Parent := setupform;
PassEdit.Left := 70;
PassEdit.Top := 105;
PassEdit.Width := 121;
PassEdit.Height := 21;
PassEdit.TabOrder := 3;

YDropButton := TRadioButton.Create(setupform);
YDropButton.Parent := setupform;
YDropButton.Left := 30;
YDropButton.Top := 175;
YDropButton.Width := 93;
YDropButton.Height := 17;
YDropButton.Caption := 'Drop Ores Only';
YDropButton.TabOrder := 5;

NDropButton := TRadioButton.Create(setupform);
NDropButton.Parent := setupform;
NDropButton.Left := 150;
NDropButton.Top := 175;
NDropButton.Width := 93;
NDropButton.Height := 17;
NDropButton.Caption := 'Drop Everthing';
NDropButton.TabOrder := 6;

CancelButton := TButton.Create(setupform);
CancelButton.Parent := setupform;
CancelButton.OnClick := @CancelClick;
CancelButton.Left := 160;
CancelButton.Top := 200;
CancelButton.Width := 75;
CancelButton.Height := 25;
CancelButton.Caption := 'Cancel';
CancelButton.TabOrder := 8;
end;

procedure SafeInitFormsetup;
var
  v: TVariantArray;
begin
  setarraylength(V, 0);
  ThreadSafeCall('initsetup', v);
end;

procedure ShowFormModalsetup;
begin
  setupform.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeShowFormModalsetup;
var
  v: TVariantArray;
begin
  setarraylength(V, 0);
  ThreadSafeCall('ShowFormModalsetup', v);
end;


Procedure DeclareVar;
begin

      user:= UserEdit.Text;
      pass:= PassEdit.Text;
      nick:= NickEdit.Text;
      
     if(YDropButton.Checked)then Drops := true;
     if(NDropButton.Checked)then Drops := false;
      
     Case OreBox.Text of

    'Copper'  : RockType := Copper;
    'Tin'     : RockType := Tin;
    'Clay'    : RockType := Clay;
    'Iron'    : RockType := Iron;
    'Silver'  : RockType := Silver;
    'Coal'    : RockType := Coal;
    'Gold'    : RockType := Gold;
    'Mithril' : RockType := Mithril;
    'Adamant' : RockType := Adamant;
    
end;
    Case RockType of
    
    Clay    : XPRock   := 5;
    Copper  : XPRock   := 17;
    Tin     : XPRock   := 17;
    Iron    : XPRock   := 35;
    Silver  : XPRock   := 40;
    Coal    : XPRock   := 50;
    Gold    : XPRock   := 65;
    Mithril : XPRock   := 80;
    Adamant : XPRock   := 95;
    
    end;


end;



//=============================Report===========================================
Procedure ChangeReport(Reason : String);
var
   wMinutes,wSeconds,RHours,RMinutes,RSeconds,avtime:LongInt;
  Time:string;
begin
  wSeconds:=(GetSystemTime-ST) div 1000;
  wMinutes:=wSeconds div 60;
  RHours:=wMinutes div 60;
  Time:=inttostr(wSeconds)+' Seconds';
  if(DroppedOres>0)then
    avtime:=wSeconds/DroppedOres;
  if wMinutes<>0 then
  begin
    RSeconds:=wSeconds Mod (wMinutes*60);
    Time:=inttostr(wMinutes)+' Minutes and '+inttostr(RSeconds)+' Seconds';
  end;
  if RHours<>0 then
  begin
    RMinutes:=wMinutes Mod (RHours*60);
    RSeconds:=wSeconds Mod (wMinutes*60);
    Time:=inttostr(RHours)+' Hours, '+inttostr(RMinutes)+
    ' Minutes and '+inttostr(RSeconds)+' Seconds';
  end;
  
  Status(Reason);
  ClearReport;
  AddToReport('Rjop455''s Auto Miner');
  AddToReport('*********************');
  AddToReport('Currently: ' + Reason);
  AddToReport('Ores Mined: ' + inttostr(OresMined) );
  AddToReport('XP gained ' + inttostr(XP));
  AddToReport('Worked for: ' + Time);
End;

//=============================AntiBans/AntiRandoms=============================
procedure AntiBans;
Begin
  DisguiseScar('Winamp');
  RandomChatEvery(10 + Random(5));
  RotateEvery(20 + Random(10));
  LeaveScreenEvery(5 + Random(5));
  HoverEvery(15 + Random(5), 'random');
  PickUpMouseEvery(5 + Random(10))
  RandomRClickEvery(15 + random(5))
    if (KillScriptTime > 0) then
    KillScript(KillScriptTime);
LogOutEvery(1 + random(3), 20 + random(50));
end;


procedure AntiRandoms;
begin
  If Not(FindNewBox) then
    begin
    If (Players[CurrentPlayer].Loc = 'New Box') then
    begin
     Players[CurrentPlayer].Loc := '';
    end;
  end;
  wait(10);
  FindNormalRandoms;
  wait(10)
  FindPick;
  wait(10)
  FindFight;
  wait(10)
  if (FindFight) then
        begin
        RunTo('N', true)
        end;
  wait(10)
  FindTalk;
  wait(10)
   if (FindNewBox) then
  begin
    OpenBox;
    SolveBox;
    wait(1000);
    if (FindNewBox) then
    begin
      GambleNewBox;
    end;
    if (FindNewBox) then
    begin
      LogOut;
      Writeln('Unable To Solve Box....');
      Players[CurrentPlayer].Loc := 'New Box';
    end;
  end;
end;

//=============================Mining/Dropping=================================


procedure Mining;
var r, count, SysTime, ExtraXP :Integer;
GotOre :boolean;
begin
  SetRandomOreColor;
  ChangeReport('Mining...')
  GotOre:=false;
  count:=InvCount;
  if(FindObj(x,y,'Mine',OreColor,5))then
  begin
    if(not(FindGas(x,y)))then
    begin
      Mouse(x,y,r,r,true);
      if(FlagPresent)then
      begin
        Flag;
        Wait(500+random(500));
      end;
      MarkTime(SysTime);
      repeat
      if(not(FindColorSpiral(x,y,OreColor,210,130,300,220)))then
        break;
        Wait(100+random(200));
      if(not(GetColor(109,430)=0)and(not(GetColor(195,426)=0)))then
      begin
        If(InvCount >= count +1)Then
        begin
          OresMined:=OresMined+1
          XP:=XP + XPRock;
          GotOre:=true
        if(XPRock = 17)Then
          begin
            ExtraXP:=ExtraXP+1;
          if(ExtraXP = 2)then
          begin
           XP:=XP + 1;
           ExtraXP:= 0;
          end;

          end;

        end;
      end;
      if(TimeFromMark(SysTime)>=MaxWait*1000 = true)then
     begin
     GotOre:=true
     end;
      until(GotOre=true)
    end;
  end;
end;

procedure Drop;
var Beer:Integer;
begin
    Beer := BitmapFromString(5, 5,
    '000001C9C1C9CDC5CDD0CAD0CDC5CD000001D7D1D7D9D2D8DAD5D9' +
    'DDD9DD564D42000001E6E2E6E7E4E7E8E5E8564D42000001C09018' +
    'F4F2F4F2F0F2544A3B000001C09018C09018C09018');
    if(FindItemBmpTol(Beer,50))then
      begin
      ClickAllItemsNameWait('Drop','Eat',0);
      ClickAllItemsNameWait('Drop','Drink',0);
    end;

   if(Drops = false)then
   begin
     ChangeReport('Dropping All Items...')
     AntiRandoms;
     ClickAllItemsNameWait('Drop','Use',0);
   end;

   if(Drops = true)then
   begin
     ChangeReport('Dropping Ores Only...')
     AntiRandoms;
     ClickAllItemsBmpTolWait('Drop',Ore,50,0);
   end;

end;


//=============================Run Script=======================================
Begin
   SetupSRL;
   SetupSRLMining;
   SafeInitFormSetup;
   SafeShowFormModalsetup;
   DeclareVar;
   DeclarePlayers;
   AntiBans;
   ActivateClient;
   LoginPlayer;
   FindPickHeadColor;
   SetRun(true);
   FindOreColors(RockType,5,10);
Repeat
   AntiRandoms;
   Mining;
   if(InvFull)then
   begin
     Drop;
   end;
Until(false)
End.

There you go. Hope this helps. Last time I used my script it worked. If it has any problems let me know, so I can fix them

Read full topic

item.title: Rjop's Power Miner V 1.5

@your_enemy wrote:

would you know how to fix this? or could you post a text version of your script so i could just copy and paste that.

thanks alot
